programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A border collie/springer spaniel mix bolts toward small animals; a shepherd mix has a biting problem; a pushy poodle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Basset hounds sibling rivalry; aggressive dog; possessive poodle-mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a disrespectful yellow Lab who causes chaos everywhere she goes and some dogs who are misbehaving at the office.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog fails the doggy day-care entrance exam; three Jack Russell terriers fight one another for their owner's attention; a beagle howls incessantly while on walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: After a 45-day stint in Iraq and two hurricanes, an explosive-sniffing ATF Labrador retriever begins exhibiting severe symptoms of terror.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps an overly aggressive German shepherd and a timid rat terrier.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help bring peace to Jennifer Lee Pryor's home, where fights have been breaking out among foster dogs and her own four dogs; an aggressive beagle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Lab-greyhound mix has aggression problems; a Rhodesian Ridgeback-boxer mix has severe dog aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier barks too much; a once-shy German shepherd becomes aggressive; a shepherd mix has a whining problem.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help an aggressive Shiba Inu from Japan and meets a wire fox terrier who has a fixation with a riding lawn-mower.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar revisits some of his toughest cases and sees how being on the show changed not only the dogs, but the lives of the owners.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Alaskan malamute exhibits aggressive tendencies; Cesar helps a professional dog walker with her clients.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: At an army base, Cesar helps an Australian shepherd scared of men in uniform and a Shetland shepherd who barks non-stop when planes fly overhead.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps two former gang members through Homeboy Industries, an outreach program designed to break the cycle of gang violence but who have problem dogs at home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Melody and Tom, who is so terrified of dogs that he will even leave a job site if one is near, deal with their fears and anxieties.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a newlywed couple whose dogs don't let them get close and another pair who met online and are nervous about introducing their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Young fans Jessica and Rachel join Cesar as he deals with a tiny dog with an outsized personality and a nervous pit bull mix afraid of the sea.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps owners of rescue dogs including a terrier mix that screams and a Belgian Tervuren scared of her own home; Cesar helps a family adopting their first dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar travels to the U.K. to help troubled dog owners with a territorial street dog and a dalmatian whose personality can turn ugly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: British problem dogs including wild German Shepherds, a dog that must be muzzled by court order, and an English cocker spaniel that hates cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Problem dogs in the U.K. including two dogs that spent most of their lives in Africa, and a barking Jack Russell terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar's English adventure ends with an aggressive klee kai, a collie mix that hates walks, and a hyper Labrador.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar brings discipline to four chaotic Chinese crested dogs, an over-energetic mastiff mix and two unruly miniature dachshunds.
